page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT - UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: {South Tyneside}has been suffering for some years from the decline of its traditional industrial base of ship building, ship repair, engineering and coal mining. This has resulted in one of the worst unemployment rates in the country.The council have provided small factories and workshops with the aid of government incentive schemes. As the result of a{J.C.L.}report {Tyneside Economic Development Company {Ltd.}set up a{Business Enterprise {Centre}to encourage people to set up in business for the first time. The centre offers small flexible units on 'easy in easy out'terms with a number of readily available back up services to assist small businesses. The licence fee covers _rent,rates,heating lighting, electricity,telephone and message taking service,as well as photocopying,typing and meeting rooms.
